title: सरकार द्वारा जारी नए ट्रैफिक नियमों के अनुसार चालान काटने पर दो पुलिसवालों की पिटाई हुई
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: #WATCH: A man who was allegedly drunk assaulted two traffic policemen in Karnataka's Davangere earlier today. Police arrested the man and a case has been registered against him. pic.twitter.com/kahGksU0A7
